name: TwoNukes
description:
Historically Accurate Game Jam 3

This game is all about destruction. Kill enemies and blow your enemies buildings up before they blow yours. Get points, win rounds and be the new Ruler of the World.

Controls:

WASD - Move
Space - Shoot
Keyboard 1 - World Map view
Keyboard 2 - Third person view

Credits:

Font: https://www.dafont.com/splendid66.font

Sound effects are under CC0 license and mainly from https://freesound.org and YouTube channel All Sounds:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFnmEGz7dcAwYflQYfhQccA

3D-modeling, programming, music: All me
